Eat the delicious Pag lamb. The lambs of the island of Pag eat a diet of sage, rosemary and lavender and, as a result, the taste is mild and flavorful.

The island is also famous for its Pag cheese.

value: is a short drive, and about a 10 minute, from the center of the City of Pag. It is a clean, friendly hotel with an excellent restaurant. Make sure to have a shot of the house schnapps when you are there.
content=Grad-Pag.com is a directory of tourist facilities (apartments, rooms, bungalows) located in Pag (island of Pag) and surrounding areas.
